package.name: Renkoo
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long: Renkoo has a cool fading effect with each incoming message. It also includes smooth scrolling. This however may be slow. So Renkoo Naked was born to bring the beautiful message style some needed speed. It has all of the color combos and everything you like about Renkoo, minus the fading and smooth scroll features. This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=2160
